channel.title: Toggling run reloads tabs?
channel.description:
I've been working on my 530 and came across this when I was playing around. I don't know if this is client sided but when I toggle run my quest tab refreshes? This may happen to the others too. I'm using Rs2hd for those wondering and it does not seem like a server sided problem. :confused:
The client is a normal 530 deob.

item.title: Toggling run reloads tabs?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

post all methods handling the run button (if there are any) or the running methods.
post all quest tab handling methods as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Toggling run reloads tabs?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:529911”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=648666.msg4361918#msg4361918 date=1378922754]
I’m using Rs2hd for those wondering and it does not seem like a server sided problem.
[/quote]then why post in server help?

try using another 530 client. if the error persists it must be server sided[/quote]

I don’t know if it’s client sided. The client does not make a difference on what I use but I’m not sure if its what Jagex did.

If there is a problem with toggling run on rs2hd lemmie know because it looked fine to me.

Read full topic
